title: Sample, ca. 1948
medium:
Medium: cotton, synthetic
Technique: plain weave
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 19 x 18.5 cm (7 1/2 x 7 5/16 in.)
creditline: Gift of the Estate of Dorothy (Liebes) Morin
description: Warp of smooth two-ply yarn alternating with boucle yarn. Weft is repeating pattern, each unit containing two smooth synthetic yarns, one metal braided over a central core, one chenille, one paired narrow boucle yarns, two chenille, two paired boucle yarns and one woven ball fringe.
